title: Serif Typeface From The Cover Of "Tangerine Dream - ...In The Beginning"
content:
I've been searching for the font on this album cover for a while now but I cannot find it. I vaguely remember having seen it elsewhere but I cannot be sure. The album is from the mid 1980s.

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks for viewing!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526023512im_/http:/i.imgur.com/iVPwTkq.jpg)
author: Hexahedral

comments.content: Company was a predigital typeface long before Martin Wait [made a font out of it](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526023512/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/martinwait/company/). I doubt you'll find anything closer digitally.
That helps me well enough :) Thanks Mike!
